item.title: Evaluating Hebbian Learning in a Semi-supervised Setting - SpringerLink
item.description: Evaluating Hebbian Learning in a Semi-supervised Setting | SpringerLink #Omnivore #hebbian Read on Omnivore Read Original Highlights In this work, we propose a semi-supervised learning approach, in which the unsupervised pre-training step is performed by means of the Hebbian learning paradigm.
